lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots released defensive back Willie Andrews, 24, one day after he was arrested and charged with illegal possession of a firearm and assault with a dangerous weapon. Andrews’s girlfriend told the police said that he pointed a handgun at her head. Andrews, primarily a special teams player, was being held without bail pending a hearing.
